entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1407403 - Statement - État des flux de trésorerie, méthode indirecte (Détails) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, sny:AjustementPourProfitsPertesRealisesSurLaCessionDeParticipationsDansDesFilialesDesCoentreprisesEtDesEntreprisesAssocieesImpotsDifferes, ifrs-full:InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromDisposalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets, sny:DividendesRecusDesSocietesNonConsolideesClassesDansLesActivitesOperationnelles All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0138.9840] The filing does not report either the element IncomeStatementAbstract or StatementOfComprehensiveIncomeAbstract in any presentation linkroles. According to ESMA filing rules this abstract item must be reported as the root element of a Income Statement or StatementOfComprehensiveIncomeAbstract appearing in the filing.
Rule Element Id:9840 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
